name: chat-sample
description: Sample chat extension, a trusty cat tutor that will can teach you computer science topics.

chatParticipants.name: cat
chatParticipants.description: Meow! What can I teach you?

commands.name: randomTeach
commands.description: Pick at random a computer science concept then explain it in purfect way of a cat

commands.name: play
commands.description: Do whatever you want, you are a cat after all

disambiguation.description: The user just wants to relax and see the cat play.
examples: Enough learning, let the cat play with a ball of yarn
Can you show me a cat playing with a laser pointer?

disambiguation.description: The user wants to learn a specific computer science topic in an informal way.
examples: Teach me C++ pointers using metaphors
Explain to me what is a linked list in a simple way
Can you explain to me what is a function in programming?

commands.name: all
commands.description: Use all registered tools. By default, only this extension's tools are used.
